headline: Caterpillar (CAT) Rises Higher Than Market: Key Facts

headline: Caterpillar Inc. to Announce Second-Quarter 2025 Financial Results Aug. 5
summary: Caterpillar Inc. (NYSE: CAT) will release second-quarter 2025 financial results at 5:30 a.m. CDT Tuesday, Aug. 5. The full text of the release will be available at investors.caterpillar.com/financials/quarterly-results and on PR Newswire. The release will be furnished to the U.S. Securities and Exchange Commission (SEC) via a Current Report on Form 8-K in compliance with applicable SEC rules.
